Posts.Content: Thank you for great information. My brother died of liver cancer many years ago. I am always thinking about lower the risk of having cancer.
Posts.Title: Prevention is better than cure.

Posts.Content: I am so sorry about your wife's cancer. I am praying for you and your family. I hope you are having all the suport you need. My wife's family in Vietnam has been experienced many cases of cancers in the family. A new member was diagnosed breast cancer. She had one of her breast removed 2 weeks ago. I am not sure the cancer treatment there is the same like here in US or different. Good luck to you all!
Posts.Title: Return of wife's cancer: No chemo.....???

Posts.Content: I know someone from Vietnam was diagnosed of breast cancer. She had one of her breast removed right the way after diagnose. My question is when would be chemo applied in breast cancer rather than removing it? Thanks.
Posts.Title: How long to take chemo treatment?

Posts.Content: Hi Vee, Thank you very much for getting back to my question. I know 2 people that related to my family have breast cancer. I just want to know more about it so that I can support and help them.
Posts.Title: How long to take chemo treatment?

Posts.Content: To Vee, thanks for good info and advice. My wife's brother died of liver cancer 20years ago when he was 39. There were not really any good treatments for cancer those day. He was gone about 2 weeks after he had been diagnosed. Do you know is it possible to have treatments for liver cancer? I mean is liver cancer treatable?
Posts.Title: How long to take chemo treatment?

Posts.Content: I understand what you are going through. I am praying for you. I know someone was just diagnosed breast cancer. She is also terrified. She had a lump removed from her breast last year. She just had a breast removed 2 weeks ago. I really pray for you all to be cancer survivors.
Posts.Title: Terrified...........please help!!!
